Package camzup.core

Class Ray2

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Ray2
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Ray2
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
A direction that extends from an originating point.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Ray2.AbstrComparator
    An abstract class that may serve as an umbrella for any custom comparators of Ray2 s.

      public static float intersectLineSeg​(Ray2 ray, Vec2 origin, Vec2 dest)
      Finds an intersection between a ray and a line segment. Returns -1.0 if there is no intersection. Otherwise, returns a value in [0.0, 1.0] .

      origin - the origin

      the list of points
